H0.text: The Old Faithful geyser is in which American national park. Yosemite National Park

H1.text: The Old Faithful geyser is in which American national park. Zion National Park

H2.text: The Old Faithful geyser is in which American national park. Grand Canyon National Park

H3.text: The Old Faithful geyser is in which American national park. Yellowstone

A4.text: Old Faithful is a cone geyser in Yellowstone National Park in Wyoming, United States.
